availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County resident. Native of Ireland. Immigrated in 1843. Married Jerry Sheehan.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-004-1307. KYR-0001-004-1397. Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 48. Thirteenth Census of the United States (1910), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Grassy Creek, p. 4. Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), Ancestry, 1917, Pendleton County, file no. 2225. “Jerry Sheehan,” Find A Grave, July 26, 2010, Memorial no. 55496899.
